Plot: When a tragedy strikes close to home, four police officers struggle with their faith and their roles as husbands and fathers; together they make a decision that will change all of their lives.
Title: Courageous
Actors: Ken Bevel, Alex Kendrick, Kevin Downes, Renee Jewell
tomatoConsensus: While the filmmaking is fairly competent, Courageous is overall worthless to anybody who doesn't subscribe to its dogmatic agenda.
